TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi abstract beforefieldinit BaseDataBoundControlDesigner extends System.Web.UI.Design.ControlDesigner
Public MustInherit Class BaseDataBoundControlDesigner Inherits ControlDesigner
public ref class BaseDataBoundControlDesigner abstract : System::Web::UI::Design::ControlDesigner

summary.span: 在視覺化設計工具中，為衍生自 類別的控制項提供設計階段支援。

span.span: Provides design-time support in a visual designer for controls that are derived from the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在視覺化設計工具中，當您從來源切換至 [設計] 檢視中，標記描述控制項衍生自類別會經過剖析，而在設計介面上建立控制項的設計階段版本。In a visual designer, when you switch from Source to Design view, the markup that describes a control that is derived from the class is parsed and a design-time version of the control is created on the design surface. 當您切換回原始碼檢視時，以設計階段控制項的程式碼保存到標記來源並編輯網頁的標記。When you switch back to Source view, the design-time control code is persisted to the markup source and edited into the markup for the Web page. 衍生自的設計工具抽象基底類別衍生自的控制項提供設計階段支援類別。Designers that are derived from the abstract base class provide design-time support for controls that are derived from the class.

related.span: ASP.NET 控制項設計工具簡介

span.span: Introduction to ASP.NET Control Designers

related.span: 逐步解說：建立基本的控制項設計工具的 Web 伺服器控制項

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Attribute.AttributeName: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks .NET Framework 在內部建立衍生自的設計工具的新執行個體類別建立關聯的控制項在設計介面上時。The .NET Framework internally constructs a new instance of a designer that is derived from the class when it creates the associated control on the design surface.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance bool ConnectToDataSource() cil managed
Protected MustOverride Function ConnectToDataSource () As Boolean

summary.span: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，一般是從先前的資料來源取消攔截事件，然後附加新事件至新的資料來源。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, typically unhooks events from the previous data source, and then attaches new events to the new data source.

returns.span: 一般來說，如果執行連接至新的資料來源，則為 ；如果新舊資料來源都相同，則為 。

span.span: if a connection to a new data source was performed, typically; if the old and new data sources are the same.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 實作方法通常牽涉到 hook 事件從先前的資料來源，並接著將新的事件附加至新的資料來源。The implementation of the method typically involves unhooking events from the previous data source, and then attaching new events to the new data source.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void CreateDataSource() cil managed

summary.span: 在衍生的類別中覆寫時，會為關聯的 物件建立新的資料來源。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, creates a new data source for the associated object.

remarks.format: ## Examples 如需覆寫，會顯示一個對話方塊，可用來建立資料來源關聯的控制項，請參閱。For an example of a override that displays a dialog that can be used to create a data source for the associated control, see .

para.span: 覆寫方法，以提供一種建立相關聯的控制項在設計階段的物件。

span.span: Override the method to provide a means of creating a control for the associated object at design time.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void DataBind(class System.Web.UI.WebControls.BaseDataBoundControl dataBoundControl) cil managed
Protected MustOverride Sub DataBind (dataBoundControl As BaseDataBoundControl)

param.name: dataBoundControl
param.span: 與這個設計工具關聯的 。

span.span: The with which this designer is associated.

summary.span: 在衍生類別中覆寫時，請執行必要的動作，以設定衍生自 類別的關聯控制項。

span.span: When overridden in a derived class, performs the necessary actions to set up the associated control that is derived from the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 當您覆寫方法，在設計工具中，衍生自類別中，執行必要的動作，來設定資料繫結控制項，讓控制項的設計階段標記擷取時，是否正確轉譯。When you override the method in a designer that is derived from the class, perform the necessary actions to set up the data-bound control so that when the design-time markup is retrieved, the control renders properly. 一般而言，您會建立關聯的設計階段資料來源，而不是即時的資料來源，基於效能考量。Typically, you will associate a design-time data source rather than the live data source, for performance reasons.

member this.DataSource : string with get, set

summary.span: 取得或設定關聯控制項的 屬性值。

span.span: Gets or sets the value of the property for the associated control.

value.span: 資料繫結運算式，由衍生自 的關聯控制項使用。

span.span: The data-binding expression used by the associated control derived from .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 屬性是用來陰影屬性與這個設計工具相關聯的類別。The property is used to shadow the property of the class that is associated with this designer. 值屬性時，會保存由設計工具上，為在標記產生的基礎上的資料繫結運算式物件。The value of the property is persisted by the designer as a data-binding expression on the tag that is generated for the underlying object.

Protected Overrides Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)

param.name: disposing
param.span: 表示釋放 Managed 和 Unmanaged 資源， 則表示只釋放 Unmanaged 資源。

span.span: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.

summary.span: 釋放 物件所使用的 Unmanaged 資源，並選擇性釋放 Managed 資源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources that are used by the object, and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法取消的事件處理常式攔截所有的資料來源活動的設計工具。The method unhooks the event handlers for the designer from all data source events.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance string GetDesignTimeHtml() cil managed
Public Overrides Function GetDesignTimeHtml () As String

summary.span: 產生在設計階段用來呈現控制項的標記。

span.span: Generates the markup that is used to render the control at design time.

returns.span: 在設計階段用來呈現控制項的標記。

span.span: The markup used to render the control at design time.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別擷取用於在設計階段呈現控制項之前繫結用途的範例資料。The class retrieves sample data that is used for binding purposes at design time before rendering the control. 如果控制項不是資料繫結，則會呼叫方法。If the control is not data bound, it calls the method. 如果沒有呈現控制項發生錯誤，則會呼叫方法。If there is an error rendering the control, it calls the method.

related.span: ASP.NET 控制項設計工具簡介

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance string GetEmptyDesignTimeHtml() cil managed
Protected Overrides Function GetEmptyDesignTimeHtml () As String

summary.span: 如果控制項是空白，或者無法擷取資料來源，則提供在設計階段用來呈現控制項的標記。

span.span: Provides the markup that is used to render the control at design time if the control is empty or if the data source cannot be retrieved.

returns.span: 在設計階段用來利用空資料來源以呈現控制項的標記。

span.span: The markup used to render the control at design time with an empty data source.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別擷取用於在設計階段呈現控制項之前繫結用途的範例資料。The class retrieves sample data that is used for binding purposes at design time before rendering the control. 空的設計階段控制項呈現為包含型別名稱和控制項名稱的預留位置。The empty design-time control renders as a placeholder that contains the type name and control name.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance string GetErrorDesignTimeHtml(class System.Exception e) cil managed
Protected Overrides Function GetErrorDesignTimeHtml (e As Exception) As String

span.span: The that was thrown.

summary.span: 當錯誤發生時，提供在設計階段用來呈現控制項的標記。

span.span: Provides the markup that is used to render the control at design time when an error has occurred.

returns.span: 當錯誤發生時，在設計階段用來呈現控制項的標記。

span.span: The markup used to render the control at design time when an error has occurred.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 錯誤在設計階段控制項轉譯為預留位置，其中包含的型別名稱、 控制項名稱，以及描述錯誤的訊息。The error design-time control renders as a placeholder that contains the type name, the control name, and a message describing the error.

Public Overrides Sub Initialize (component As IComponent)

param.name: component
param.span: 衍生自 的控制項，會實作 。

span.span: A control derived from , which implements .

summary.span: 準備設計工具，以檢視、編輯和設計關聯控制項。

span.span: Prepares the designer to view, edit, and design the associated control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 設計工具主應用程式呼叫方法時就準備好使用設計工具來呈現控制項衍生自類別。The designer host calls the method when it is ready to use the designer to render a control that is derived from the class. 方法和其基底方法設定屬性，並連接設計工具的運作所需的事件。The method and its base methods configure properties and connect events that are necessary for the operation of the designer.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnDataSourceChanged(bool forceUpdateView) cil managed
Protected Overridable Sub OnDataSourceChanged (forceUpdateView As Boolean)
abstract member OnDataSourceChanged : bool -> unit override this.OnDataSourceChanged : bool -> unit

param.name: forceUpdateView
param.span: 表示強制更新設計階段標記，否則為 。

span.span: to force the update of design-time markup; otherwise, .

summary.span: 在關聯 物件的資料來源變更時呼叫。

span.span: Called when the data source of the associated object changes.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會連線到目前的資料來源。The method connects to the current data source. 如果目前的資料來源是不同於資料來源的控制項先前連線，或是`forceUpdateView`是`true`，關聯的控制項的設計介面上重新繪製。If the current data source is different from the data source to which the control was previously connected, or `forceUpdateView` is `true`, the associated control is redrawn on the design surface.

para.span: 覆寫執行相關聯的控制項的資料來源變更時所需的其他動作的方法。

span.span: Override the method to perform additional actions that are required when the data source of the associated control changes.

para.span: 如果您覆寫方法呼叫的基底實作，然後再執行其他處理程序。

span.span: If you override the method, call the base implementation before performing other processing.

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig newslot virtual instance void OnSchemaRefreshed() cil managed
abstract member OnSchemaRefreshed : unit -> unit override this.OnSchemaRefreshed : unit -> unit

summary.span: 在關聯 物件的資料來源載入新的結構描述時呼叫。

span.span: Called when the data source of the associated object loads a new schema.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 方法會處理事件，就會引發這個事件時的結構描述的資料來源相關聯的控制項繫結的變更。The method handles the event, which is raised when the schema of the data source to which the associated control is bound changes. 覆寫執行其他動作使用新的結構描述時所需的方法。Override the method to perform additional actions that are required when new schema is available.

related.span: ASP.NET 控制項設計工具簡介

span.span: Introduction to ASP.NET Control Designers

related.span: 逐步解說：建立基本的控制項設計工具的 Web 伺服器控制項

MemberSignature.Value: .method familyhidebysig virtual instance void PreFilterProperties(class System.Collections.IDictionary properties) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub PreFilterProperties (properties As IDictionary)

span.span: The containing the properties to filter.

summary.span: 供設計工具使用，以便在 [屬性] 方格的顯示中移除或加入其他屬性，或是遮蔽關聯控制項的屬性。

span.span: Used by the designer to remove or add additional properties for display in the **Properties** grid or to shadow properties of the associated control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 控制項設計工具使用的方法，衍生自陰影各種不同的控制項屬性，與對應的設計階段屬性設計工具實作，並以新增或移除屬性的方法**的屬性**方格中。Control designers use methods that are derived from the method to shadow various control properties with corresponding design-time properties that the designer implements, and to add or remove properties from the **Properties** grid. 針對類別， shadows控制項的屬性。For the class, the shadows the property of the control. 它會建立一份屬性陣列的，然後將這些屬性加入至已遮蔽的屬性。It makes a copy of the attribute array of the , and then adds these attributes to the shadowed property. 它會設定屬性的受遮蔽屬性設`false`除非屬性控制項的屬性已設為`true`。It sets the attribute of the shadowed property to `false` unless the attribute of the property of the control is already set to `true`.

para.span: 覆寫方法，以將屬性新增至或變更設計階段屬性集合中屬性的屬性。

span.span: Override the method to add properties to or change attributes of properties in the design-time property collection.

para.span: 請務必呼叫基底方法，然後再執行其他處理程序。

span.span: Be sure to call the base method before performing other processing.

The type of data source.

span.span: to enable editing of the configuration, or to disable configuration editing.

summary.span: 在設計主應用程式 (例如 [!INCLUDE[vsprvslong](~/includes/vsprvslong-md.md)]) 中，顯示對話方塊以協助使用者建立資料來源。
